page_login.title: Log in
page_login.description: Log in and start saving. If you are not part of My Royal, sign up and get an instant discount, plus enjoy our subscriber-exclusive benefits.
page_login.title-gms-program: Important information about My Royal Program
page_login.text2: Log in with your preferred social network
page_login.benefits-footer: Take advantage of these exclusive benefits! Log in or sign up for My Royal today, start saving, and let the fun begin.

benefits.title: Additional discounts:
benefits.description: Save more with My Royal; get up to 10% in extra discounts on our hotel deals.

benefits.title: Always First for Exclusive Deals:
benefits.description: Access private deals, advance purchase discounts, pre-sales with bigger discounts to stay during the best seasons, and more.

benefits.title: My Royal Newsletter:
benefits.description: Stay informed with the latest updates and exclusive information regarding Grand Residences and all our resorts. Discover new features, exciting events, and much more.
